[b]Arrest/Criminal Record[/b]:
 - Dated notes on public civilian arrest records
 - YYYY - Charge. Precinct/Location. Sentencing.

[b]SCUJ Record[/b]:
 - Dated notes on SCUJ/military violations
 - YYYY - Charge. Precinct/Location. Sentencing.

[b]Security Notes[/b]:
 - Summarized list of anything security personnel should probably be aware of, that isn't included above
